body.para: The following M code are used to supply coolant.

list.li: There are some M code that cannot be used depending upon the machine specifications and the options provided.
In order to discharge Through Spindle Coolant/Air, usage of the Through Spindle must be set on the Tool Data Management screen.

para.draft-comment: Replace Figure to "Tool Data Management Screen" from Chp 12 folder in Graphic folder

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:13px;
text-align:center; page-break-before:always;
